segments.text: Gongshan Development Co . , Ltd.may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to speak your export manager , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I ask who's calling , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Mrs Wang , from Jane coper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry Mrs wang , but Mrs Fu is not in at the moment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When will he come back , do you know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please ask him to give me a call as soon as he return . he has my number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , Mrs wang . I'll do that .
segments.speaker: S1
